sections.purpose: To ensure proper exit from the laboratory after completion of work.
procedure: Switch OFF all instruments after use.
Return equipment and materials to designated places.
precautions: Wear appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE) when exiting the laboratory.
Ensure all chemicals and materials are properly stored before exit.
Follow all laboratory safety protocols during exit.
Report any spills or accidents to the laboratory supervisor before leaving.
Ensure no equipment is left running unattended.
